subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The American syndicate BMW Oracle Racing won a court case against America’s Cup champion Alinghi on Tuesday, giving it the right to race the Swiss team in a head-to-head series for the title next July.
snippet: The American syndicate BMW Oracle Racing won a court case against America’s Cup champion Alinghi on Tuesday, giving it the right to race the Swiss team in a head-to-head series for the title next July.
